instruction.value: Administer slowly by direct injection into area requiring sclerosis.

AdditionalNotes.value: Varicose veins. Use 10 mg/mL concentration in small veins. Suggested MAXIMUM treatment dose is 10 mL.
Esophageal varicies. Suggested MAXIMUM treatment dose is 20 mL per sclerotherapy session.
Varicose veins. Use 30 mg/mL concentration for larger vericosities.
